meanings.definition: To ride a wave without a surfboard, using only one's body.
meanings.sent1: I love to bodysurf at the beach during summer.
meanings.sent2: People often bodysurf when the waves are just right.
meanings.sent3: Trying to bodysurf in a pool would be quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: She bodysurfed through the crowd of people at the concert.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of bodysurfing the waves is exhilarating.
